title: Registry Visual Effects Settings
description: A collection of Windows visual effect settings stored in the Registry

$schema.description: Reference to the schema definition file

List.description: Collection of visual effects settings stored in the Registry

Name.description: The name of the visual effect setting

Description.description: Brief description of what the visual effect does

Key.description: Registry key path where the setting is stored

Type.description: The implementation type for the visual effect

DataOff.description: Value when the effect is turned off

DataOn.description: Value when the effect is turned on

Broadcast.description: Broadcast message type to send after changing this setting
